author: cms-nanoAOD
body:
Changes in this PR:

- Changes to PS weight implementation
- Expand on CaloMET's doc
- Add NNPDF30_nlo_nf_5_pdfas 292200 preferred PDF for some Madgraph aMC 
- Also add 4f-scheme NNPDF30 nlo PDF set
- Adding some missing info for jets
- Update DQM and fix rawFactor plot also for standard jets

same as #23837 except for
- Electrons and Photons: use scale/smearing only when available (94X, 80X)
- taus: don't use 2015 training on 2018 data
@gpetruc
title: Various NanoAOD fixes (PDF, PS weights, jets) master version
